fields.health_warning: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) ACCORDING TO THE SURGEON GENERAL, WOMEN SHOULD NOT DRINK ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES DURING PREGNANCY BECAUSE OF THE RISK OF BIRTH DEFECTS. (2) CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES IMPAIRS YOUR ABILITY TO DRIVE A CAR OR OPERATE MACHINERY, AND MAY CAUSE HEALTH PROBLEMS.

fieldDetails.reasoning: Prominent text at top of front label reads 'DOMAINE DE MONTREDON'.
The grape/type designation 'Carignan' is shown prominently on the front label.
Back label near the barcode area shows 'ALC. 13.5% BY VOL.' (followed by the net contents).
Back label lists the bottle size as '750 ML' next to the alcohol content statement.

fieldDetails.value: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) ACCORDING TO THE SURGEON GENERAL, WOMEN SHOULD NOT DRINK ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES DURING PREGNANCY BECAUSE OF THE RISK OF BIRTH DEFECTS. (2) CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES IMPAIRS YOUR ABILITY TO DRIVE A CAR OR OPERATE MACHINERY, AND MAY CAUSE HEALTH PROBLEMS.
fieldDetails.reasoning: Standard federally mandated warning block appears on the back label beginning with 'GOVERNMENT WARNING:' followed by the two numbered statements.
Back label contains the importer line 'IMPORTED BY SOUR GRAPES WINE ASHEVILLE NC'. This field captures the name and location as printed.
The phrase 'IMPORTED BY' precedes the importer name/address on the back label.
The varietal 'Carignan' is printed on the front label and also on the back ('Carignan, Pays d'Oc').
Label includes the appellation 'Pays d'Oc' (Indication Géographique Protégée) shown on back and front.
Back label includes the sulfite declaration 'CONTAINS SULFITES' in the product information block.
No separate fanciful name distinct from the brand ('DOMAINE DE MONTREDON') is evident on the label.
Back label shows 'PRODUCT OF FRANCE' (and front shows 'Produit de France').
Back label displays the year '2022' below the 'DOMAINE DE MONTREDON' heading.
The label does not explicitly state whether the container conforms to TTB standards of fill; this cannot be determined solely from the printed text.
